Texts.Chs: 把^orange;碘^reset;带给^green;贝拉^reset;。（位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;）
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Iodine^reset; to ^green;Bella^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Good work! Several basic ingredients such as ^orange;Iodine^reset; are essential. So stay stocked! You'll need ^orange;Iodine^reset; specifically to make ^orange;Graphene^reset; and high quality ^green;fertilizers^reset;!

You'll need to find some ^orange;Caliche Stone^reset; if you want to get ^orange;Iodine^reset;. Throw batches of ^orange;Caliche Stone^reset; into your ^green;extraction lab^reset; and bring me some! You'll find them in ^orange;Desert^reset; biomes.
